info.description: The service for managing third party addons.
info.title: Azure Addons Resource Provider

get.description: Lists all of the available Addons RP operations.

items.description: Definition object with the name and properties of an operation.

display.description: Display object with properties of the operation.

schema.description: Error description and code explaining why an operation failed.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

schema.title: Error

display.description: Get the specified Canonical support plan state.
Adds the Canonical support plan type specified.
Removes the specified Canonical support plan
Gets the available Canonical support plan types as well as some extra metadata on their enabled status.
display.operation: Gets available Canonical support plan types.

display.description: Register the specified subscription with Microsoft.Addons

post.description: Returns the canonical support plan information for all types for the subscription.

parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

schema.description: The status of all Canonical support plans for a subscription.

items.description: Definition object with the properties of a canonical plan

enabled.description: Flag to indicate if this support plan type is currently enabled for the subscription.

oneTimeCharge.description: The one time charge status for the subscription.

schema.title: Canonical Support Plan Info

schema.description: Error description and code explaining why an operation failed.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

schema.title: Error

delete.description: Cancels the Canonical support plan of type {type} for the subscription.

parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The support plan type. For now the only valid type is "canonical".
parameters.name: providerName

schema.description: The status of the Canonical support plan.

id.description: The id of the ARM resource, e.g. "/subscriptions/{id}/providers/Microsoft.Addons/supportProvider/{supportProviderName}/supportPlanTypes/{planTypeName}".

name.description: The name of the Canonical support plan, i.e. "essential", "standard" or "advanced".

properties.description: Describes Canonical support plan type and status.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

schema.description: Error description and code explaining why an operation failed.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.
